bibl.title: P. Harr. 73 and 160 Revised.
bibl.note: I. P. Harris I, 73 = Inv. 190 b. Oxyrhynchus, c. A.D. 329-331. First edition of cols. I and III; re-edition of col. II. - II. P. Harris I, 160 = Inv. 190 b back. After c. A.D. 329-331. - III. P. Harris Inv. 190 c. Fourth cent. A.D. Small scrap found in the same glass frame with Inv. 190 b, not mentioned in the first edition of 73 and 160.
Coles Revel A., P. Harr. 73 and 160 Revised.
